mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.name, b.alt, b.click_url AS clickUrl, b.attachment_id AS attachmentId, b.create_by AS createBy, b.create_time AS createTime, b.update_by AS updateBy, b.update_time AS updateTime, a.filename AS fileName, a.filesize AS fileSize, a.filetype AS fileType, a.filepath AS filePath, a.file_id AS fileId FROM banner b JOIN system_attachment a ON b.attachment_id=a.id WHERE b.id=#{bannerId}
